title: Chairperson BISP pays tribute to security forces for successful anti-terror operation in KP
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 16 (APP):Chairperson of the Benazir Income Support Programme (BISP), Senator Rubina Khalid has lauded the security forces for their successful counter-terrorism operation in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
In a statement, she said the forces bravely neutralized five terrorists who were involved in heinous crimes against innocent civilians.
“The security forces have once again demonstrated remarkable courage under extreme threat,” she said.
Rubina Khalid emphasized that the security forces have always been at the forefront in defending the nation. “These terrorists were acting as Indian proxies and posed a serious threat to Pakistan’s security,” she added.
“We salute the bravery and sacrifices of our security forces,” Rubina Khalid said, assuring that their selfless services will never be forgotten.
